title: Deserving Love
description: I’m a paid killer. I have blood on my hands and too many scars under my skin.Being a killer for the Vicci Crime Family left me no time to build a lasting relationship. I certainly never imagined that my new task would lead me to the one woman who would make my heart beat again. Especially after my past with Lillian.I was supposed to protect Bethany and her son. Instead, I brought danger to their doorstep. It’s about more than saving lives when hearts are involved. Walking away is my only choice. It’s the only way to keep them safe, to keep them alive.At least that’s what I keep telling myself.
author: K.L. Myers
